verses.verse: The <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> from the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> at <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> on the <S%H4217>east,<s%> even the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> going <S%H5927>up<s%> from <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> through the hill <S%H2022>country<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>
It went <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> to <S%H3870>Luz,<s%> and passed <S%H5674>along<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H757>Archites<s%> to <S%H5852>Ataroth;<s%>

and it went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H3311>Japhletites,<s%> to the <S%H1366>border<s%> of Beth <S%H1032>Horon<s%> the <S%H8481>lower,<s%> even to <S%H1507>Gezer;<s%> and <S%H8444>ended<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%>

This was the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families.<s%> The <S%H1366>border<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> was Ataroth <S%H5853>Addar,<s%> to Beth <S%H1032>Horon<s%> the <S%H5945>upper.<s%>

The <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H3220>westward<s%> at <S%H4366>Michmethath<s%> on the <S%H6828>north.<s%> The <S%H1366>border<s%> turned <S%H5437>about<s%> <S%H4217>eastward<s%> to Taanath <S%H8387>Shiloh,<s%> and <S%H5674>passed<s%> along it on the <S%H4217>east<s%> of <S%H3239>Janoah.<s%>
It went <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H3239>Janoah<s%> to <S%H5852>Ataroth,<s%> to <S%H5292>Naarah,<s%> <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> and went <S%H3318>out<s%> at the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

From <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> went along <S%H3220>westward<s%> to the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H7071>Kanah;<s%> and <S%H8444>ended<s%> at the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> This is the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families;<s%>

together with the <S%H5892>cities<s%> which were set <S%H3995>apart<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> with their <S%H2691>villages.<s%>

They <S%H3423>didn't<s%> drive out the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> who <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H1507>Gezer;<s%> but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> and have become <S%H5647>servants<s%> to do forced <S%H4522>labor.<s%>
